derivation: middle voice from G575 (ἀποτάσσομαι) and G5021 (ἀποτάσσομαι);
kjv_def: bid farewell, forsake, take leave, send away
strongs_def: literally, to say adieu (by departing or dismissing); figuratively, to renounce
outline:
1. to set apart, separate
    1. to separate one's self, withdraw one's self from anyone
      1. to take leave of, bid farewell to
    2. to renounce, forsake
